desc: Bavswelness, Original ayurvedic kottakkal medicines products for General Wellness, Face Care, Body Care, Eye Care, Hair Care, Dental Care. Bangalore Arya Vaidya Sala Agency (BAVSA), commenced operations as a proprietorship firm in the year 1960, as Authorised Dealers of Arya Vaidya Sala Kottakkal at Lady Curzon Road.
